name: Sniper Assassin 2
storyline: Sniper Assassin 2 continues with Shawn’s story as both an agent for the government and a paid assassin. Unfortunately, someone figured out his identity and his wife was killed as a result. Angry and grieving, now he’s out to look for his wife’s killer and there’s no stopping him. On top of doing the government’s dirty work, he still takes petty missions from average citizens looking to get rid of annoying neighbors or wanting justice from unpunished criminals. Whatever the reason, it doesn’t really matter to Shawn. As long he’s getting paid the big bucks, it doesn’t matter who he has to take out.
summary: Sniper Assassin 2 continues with Shawn’s story as both an agent for the government and a paid assassin. This shooter game is simple, take out your targets but don’t harm any civilians or you’ll lose the mission.
